website_summaries.verdict: Customers love this model for its decent price and great sound.
pros: Advanced carbon nylon strings provide accurate tone
Comes with a beginner's kit that includes a gig bag, tuner, strap, and instructions booklet
Good price for a well-made instrument
cons: Some reports of this ukulele arriving missing some parts
Some of these models have trouble staying in tune

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This soprano mahogany ukulele by Kmise is a great little starter kit. It sounds better than several of my others that cost more than twice as much. And the strap is a nice touch, esp for beginners. I would def recommend this for any new players
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Kane

customer_reviews.title: ITS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: this is a great ukulele for beginners with any shape or size
customer_reviews.author: Myanah108

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ukulele package, especially for this price!!
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE this Kmise soprano ukulele! It's very attractive and well made. It took a week or so for the strings to settle in, but it now stays in tune beautifully! It has a sweet, bright sound and lots of projection. It's hard to believe you can get a ukulele package as nice as this for the price. So affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda D Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level soprano w/ extras!
customer_reviews.text: The KMU21S is a nice entry level soprano. I own two other ukes from this same company. I really like the inlayed logo and strap choice on this soprano, which weren't offered with the others. The only downside to this uke was the sloppy glue job inside. Not a deal breaker, but not like the others I own which were clean inside and out. All in all, with all the accessories, it's a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Richard White

customer_reviews.title: do your research!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best by far, size, quality, and information......love the black case for the ukulele..
customer_reviews.author: sewless

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first Kmise Uke that I have purchased. Have been pleased with all so far. I have a Tenor, as well as two baritone sized tenors and a banjolele from this maker. The guitalele proved to be just as good as my previous experience. Nicely made. Came out of the box with no problems. Readily tuned up. It did take a few days to hold a tune though that is pretty normal. Nice sound. Very playable. Will consider more from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Nice tonality on a beginner soprano ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister thinking she'd like to play uke (since I'm in a ukulele band and love it). The members of my band who are uke-savvy said the tone is really nice -- they thoroughly approved of the instrument. I ended up keeping it because my sister's hands are bigger than I thought and she needed a larger uke (like a baritone). It's a sweet sounding ukulele -- comes with a tuner and beginner chart of basic chords, a carrying case. A good value! (I play fiddle in the band so now I can learn uke too!)
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler clare

customer_reviews.title: A very pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This baritone ukulele was a very pleasant surprise. I didn’t know what to expect for the price. It has a nice satin finish and the action is low with no fret buzzing which makes it easy to play. It has good intonation and warm sound. Since this is a musical instrument, I’m uploading a video so you can see it, hear it, and make your own conclusions. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: esemprun

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool AND lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The instrument is well crafted and has a wonderful sound. I had never as much as held a ukulele but, once I went online and searched a tuning video with the basics and another to master some cords and strumming the fun began. I would recommend this uke to anyone interesting in learning a new instrument or even a first. I bought this for my grandson's 9th birthday gift (may get one for myself...). The tuner works great after I used the video to get me started. the other accessories are cool too.
customer_reviews.author: joekin1

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: I bought this inexpensive ukulele to take to a dude ranch family gathering almost as a joke. I was surprised and delighted at everything - the quality of the wood, the sound, the ease of playing it, the carrying case, the electronic tuner - and more - it's a keeper!! And we did sing songs with it and had a lot of fun. I can't say if it's for beginners because I've been playing guitar for 50 years and I intend to keep this among my musical instruments. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LA2Naples

customer_reviews.title: For my 13 year old daughter, Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just got this perfect ukelele in a couple of days ago. The color is gorgeous, it is made well. It came with a little music sheet with her being able to learn a song. A tuner, which was very simple to use. She tuned it. She has carried it everywhere with her. She has taught herself a few songs now. This was such a great investment that she wanted to purchase with her birthday gift card. I highly recommend it for younger and older ages as well.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: WOW! This is not a toy, but a very nice little instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little instrument. I chose this not only for the price point but because it came with the case, strap, tuner and online lessons. After I tuned it ( and be prepared to tune it often the first few days as it gets used to your home environment) I was playing "You are my Sunshine" to my husband. (not well, but I could do it!) Kmise is the brand name and I could not be more pleased with the quality of my little ukulele. This is just fun, portable and worth every penny. I think kids would do well with this as well as adults. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: onairlady2001

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality instrument for a great value
customer_reviews.text: Quality monogamy instrument. This is not a toy. I ordered the soprano size, the smallest one that makes the fun beautiful classic ukulele sound. Excellent value as you also get a nice padded carry bag, tuner, strap, booklet with tips and songs, and free strings for life. It takes almost two weeks to stay in tune as the strings stretch and after that it sounds wonderful and the strings do not hurt your fingers at all. They also send a small square of sandpaper that you can use to soften the the fretboard for smooth easy play. I could not be happier to have added this great ukulele to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: A great Ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Ukulele and have zero complaints. I was worried about tuning it because I pretty much only know E (or drop D) tuning from playing guitar. That was not a problem because it came with a tuner (battery included) that clips onto the Ukulele with ease. I didn't know any songs, and found it comes with a book of instructions that covers everything I would want to know as a beginner. The Ukulele is crafted well and plays really well. A cool strap is also included along with a gig bag that the Ukulele came in. I couldn't ask for a better beginning experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sills

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price especially for everything that it comes with. Ukulele comes with the strings all set up for you and an extra bag of strings as well. Has a very conveniently sized tuner and nice strap. Ukulele already has the knobs for the strap as well. Comes with a cute little beginners book that tells you how to read ukulele music and some basic chords. Also was expecting a cheap ukulele bag but its nice and even has a little padding and small front pocket. You get a pretty good ukulele though it does feel a little fragile but nothing thats going to break if youre careful. Honestly a really nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia martinez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little instrument for beginners. Sounds nice! Keeping me nicely distracted.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Ukulele. It sounds really nice, is really beautiful, and it came with everything I need to get started. My tuner was broken-the back of it won't attach, but that's not the biggest deal. I can tape the battery in so that it doesn't fall out-just looks sort of bad. To my surprise, I have already started working on a 3 chord song and its coming along! It's really fun to play and the feeling of accomplishment learning the chords is a nice break from the stress of daily life! My husband plays guitar and he's already showing off. He is really enjoying it, too. I am really glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very nice uke for the money. Does require constant tuning but i dont know if that is common on other ukes or not. I had never played a stringed instrument before buying this and I find it very enjoyable and relaxing (and sometimes frustrating) to learn on this instrument. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Balsagna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ukulele, My second one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter about a month ago. It was such a great value and a beautiful instrument with rich sound, that I thought I would also like one for myself, so we can learn to play together! How many grandmas can say that they asked for the same present for their own birthday as their grandchilds birthday? I haven't started playing it yet, so I have a lot to figure out, but am excited to learn to play a new instrument. I like the accessories that are included with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Play some happy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ukulele! I would recommend it to anyone. The ukulele is well made, the gig bag is well made and even has a pocket for accessories, and the extra strings they put in for free, The tuner works great, too. The strap is very handy for when you are standing up and playing. Even the booklet is very helpful! I am not a musician at all, but I have learned to play several songs already, and I sound good. I am very pleased with it. Also I'm pleased with the help offered by the company. This ukulele is making me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little uke, pretty too
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have the patience to learn it, had never played before, and I wasn’t enjoying the angle my hand had to be in to make notes. So when a string broke a few months after I got it, I returned it to Asurion Warranty (I had paid 9.99 for insurance, and they said the string breaking was included in coverage.). But it was a nice sounding ukulele and very pretty, and a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bundle!
customer_reviews.text: I researched and read multiple reviews before deciding on this beginner’s bundle. I was happy with the purchase since it was better than a toy ukulele I expected for the price. This bundle came with everything you need to start playing (the ukulele, a gig bag, extra strings, electric tuner, instruction booklet, and straps). I received the new ukulele within 2 days and it is absolutely smooth and perfect! I would definitely recommend buying this bundle. The company cares about their customers and stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING craftsmanship! Stays in Tune!
customer_reviews.text: Best Ukulele for beginners of Any age! The strings stay in tune for several days. Another brand I tried, the strings would go out of tune every few strums! The craftsmanship on this is high-quality. Doesn't look or feel like a toy, it's a quality instrument! The tuner that came with it was hard (for me) to use - I downloaded an app instead. The case is well-made as well, Definitely high quality. It's zippered, not just a cheap drawstring bag. And I liked that there is a strap included also. I am having a Blast with my new ukulele!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sounding Soprano!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size deceive you this little soprano sings with a punch! Model# KMU21S. It carries a warm full robust sound. The action on the fret board is low which makes it easy to play. I fell in love with this little soprano. For the price you can't beat the quality of the solid mahogany wood the beautiful sound and the easy action on the fretboard which is beautiful I must say. Plus all the extras Kmise throws in the package to get you started. The Kmise ukulele is very well-built perfect for the beginner or just adding to your ukulele collection. This is my third ukulele and I would definitely buy this little gem again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Not too Shabby.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I've been dreaming of being able to play the ukulele since I discovered Ingrid 8th grade. So a long time. Needless to say, the strings don't stay tuned because they take a while to stretch out. And some things are plastic, that I feel could've been a different material. A sturdier material. Still, I digress, it plays beautifully and suits my beginners need and spirit. I recommend it to anyone that wants to learn to play. Children and adults alike could use this comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: This ukulele is one of the best I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is one of the best I've purchased. It has a nice, bright sound and good quality strings. Besides the ukulele, it also comes with a checker patterned strap, extra strings, an instructional pamphlet, an electronic tuner, and a gig bag. The gig bag has 2 straps which makes it handy for carrying as a backpack. The tuner comes with its own batteries and is very easy to use. Unlike other ukulele straps, this strap hooks on to the uke's strap buttons, rather than other ukuleles who tug at the uke's sound hole. Thank you Kmise for this amazing ukulele!
customer_reviews.author: KARA

customer_reviews.title: Super quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic instrument - not a toy in any respect. Quality throughout. I'm a professional musician and know quality - intonation, setup - all absolutely perfect with these. Look no further and get this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Kinniburgh

customer_reviews.title: looks beautiful, sounds terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the great reviews. It looks gorgeous, and I gave it two stars for being cheap eye-candy. They did a good job of disguising a very low quality instrument as a much higher one, but the charade ends when you play it. I bought the baritone model, and picking on it sounds much worse than picking the same notes on my Kala concert uke. With a much bigger body, the baritone should resonate much better. Only very poor craftsmanship could account for the reverse being true.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR A BEGINNER
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is the perfect price for a beginner. If you don't want to spend a lot of money learning until you know you are going to carry it further this is perfect. I bought this one and once I knew I would want to learn to play more, I spent more on a higher quality instrument. I still play this one as well as the higher quality instrument. Love them both. You can't beat the price. They say you get what you pay for. With this instrument I believe I got more than I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginner. Good instructions. Couldn’t ask For anything more. For another Time, if the zipper on the case were a little longer it would be easier to put uke in and would stay open, flat. But that doesn’t diminish our satisfaction with the product or purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems good
customer_reviews.text: I've had the ukulele (brown color) for around 40 days and it seems to be good quality. To be fair, Iv'e never owned a string instrument before, so I don't have a lot to compare it to, but it's held up well to me carrying it around on a trip or two and the strings need to be tuned much less after it's been played for a while (from what i've read, that's usual with most ukuleles). The fact that it comes with an additional set of strings, soft case, tuner & beginner book (which I haven't actually used at all) was a really great value. I would totally purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M. Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome ukelele to learn!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukelele!! I bought it because I was going crazy being home all day studying without a hobby to do and I always wanted to learn ukelele. This was absolutely perfect! I play all the time and have really picked up pretty fast. It’s perfect for learning I definitely recommend! The only thing is that sometimes at the base where the strings are tied it scratches me as I play so that hurts a bit but other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Actually surprising!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is there, well made- especially at this price point. Sound quality is as good as many much higher priced ukes. One downside was a slight rattle from the headstock area. I thought it was the tuners( which look really good, btw) but it is actually the washer under one of the tuner bushings being slightly loose. Simple fix.
customer_reviews.author: mykl

customer_reviews.title: Not the best starter ukulele for adults
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ukulele for my teenage son who had been eager to learn. Although we know ukulele's are small instruments, this specific model did not meet our needs or standards. The item felt cheaply made and was not easy to learn basic steps on. We ended up returning, and purchased the next size larger and a bit more expensive, and are doing great so far. Now having experienced the difference between the two, it is evident that you do get what you pay for with this specific brand and item.
customer_reviews.author: G Unit

customer_reviews.title: Nice set up for beginner but also good enough for intermediate musicians
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a musician who wanted to learn the ukelele. He was super-pleased. It gave him everything he needed to get started. Even a second set of strings! It comes with a nice quality bag, but the box is perfect for storage for added protection. He's an accomplished guitarist so I didn't think he'd want/need the tuner but I guess they tune a little differently than guitars so he was very glad to have it. The video was filmed about an hour after he unboxed it.
customer_reviews.author: Pinktique

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ukelele set! The set came with extra strings, sanding sheet, tuner, strap, ukelele (of course) and case. I have been using the instructions sent with it but have found YouTube to work best for me. This is a nice set for a beginner and includes everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, great set for beginner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever ukulele and I gotta say it’s definitely way higher quality than expected. Pleasant sounds and I love that it comes with everything you need as a beginner! Day 1 of laying my hands on a ukulele and I already learned some key chords within an hour! So much fun🖤
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sound and stays tunned!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!! Very nice sound!!! Stays tunned!!! It included everything you need (chord chart, tunner, strap, replacemebt strings and case). Sounds is sweet. I am a musician (though I had never played an ukelele) and I Will totally recommend this uke!!! 😊 (FYI: I bought this ukelele after returning another one from a different brand because it was very poor quality, couldnt stay tunned and sounded like a toy.)
customer_reviews.author: smiling mom

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Frets, Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Has really great sound for the price, but the craftmanship leaves a lot to be desired. Straight out of the box, I noticed what looks like rust on many of the frets. I doubt this will affect playability, but it looks awful and makes me wonder about the true quality and longevity of the instrument. Debating whether it's worth the trouble to send it back and go for something more expensive. Guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: What a lot of fun! Strings it came with are pretty good ( though I did change them ). Very well constructed. I recommend adjusting the saddle to lower string height and the nut needed a light touch with the file on mine. Overall a good value!
customer_reviews.author: velofan

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Let me first start off by saying I am just a beginner. I bought a ukulele from a store from another country and played on and off for a couple of months. The ukulele I bought here has amazing reviews. I thought I couldn't go wrong. But after opening it, I immediately felt something was wrong. The main issue is that the sides of the frets all scratch you. I've now read a few other reviews that mention this. This issue alone makes this unplayable for me. The second issue is that the A string won't keep its tune for more than a few minutes it seems. Hopefully I can get a refund from this.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe this is only for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT JUST FOR BEGINNERS!!! VERY USEFUL FOR SMALL HAND PEOPLE, PEOPLE WITH ARTHRITIS, GROUPS THAT WANT ADD A SOUND TO THE MIX,GUITAR PLAYERS WANTING A SMALLER GUITAR TUNED INSTRUMENT FOR TRAVEL/CAMPFIRE
customer_reviews.author: Bofo

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My daughter learned riptide in 2 days of playing the ukulele. Tuning is a little hustle, I have to YouTube inspite of the tuner. Tuning the A string is quite an ordeal. Overall it’s a good and fun to play the simple chords songs. Strumming i still have to learn different style. Good for beginner
customer_reviews.author: Divina Cadiz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Material, and really useful extras!
customer_reviews.text: I got this Ukulele on a very timely manner and I was happily surprised by the quality of the wood and the extras that come with it, specially because of the price! If you have a problem with the strings getting out of tune really fast, thats normal for all new strings. All I did was retune about 3 times and a little bit sharper than usual and then it began holding its tune. The bag is also a nice addition, and again, DID I MENTIONED THE PRICE? Im really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner uke I’ve seen
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, this uke is well above a beginner level instrument. It’s build and sound quality is wonderful. Especially for all you get and the value. I’ve recently bought a backup beginner uke from another vendor (mainly because it was black and looked cool), and compared to the Kmise uke, it sounded like a wooden box with strings. No comparison at all. I cannot say enough positive things about this uke. It’s a very fine instrument.
customer_reviews.author: El Hikkus

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I made this purchase. Ukulele is a wonderful instrument to learn how to play to accompany yourself on songs. This brand was very inexpensive, but the feel is very sturdy, and well crafted. The strings hold tune better than my friends $200 ukulele, and this package allows safe portability. Great for a beginner or someone looking for an inexpensive ukulele to bring around with them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Z.E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Everything a Beginner Needs
customer_reviews.text: I have never played a stringed instrument, but I grew up playing the piano. Though having some background music knowledge was helpful, the included quick start guide had me playing chords the same day I received it. The kit comes with several useful things for the beginner, and the only things I bought outside of the kit were some felt picks and a music theory book. (Picks aren't necessary, it seems, but they're helpful for me as I can't quite master strumming with my hand.) I am quite pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tangela

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, sound, accessories and price!  Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a sweet little uke. Out of my 19 ukes this is fast becoming my favorite. The sound is perfect. The look is absolutely gorgeous! The redish brown tuners really stand out and add to it's beauty. I really love that it comes with everything you need. Uke, case, extra strings, and a tuner. Who could ask for more especially at this price? This baby is a real gem!
customer_reviews.author: Whokulele Teri

customer_reviews.title: I'm loving my new Uke!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I've only had this Ukelele for 4 days but I'm completely in love with it! It's easy to play and sounds great! The starter book gives you easy to read instructions on how to play it and gives you a few songs to play as well. It also came with replacement strings should I ever need to replace the strings. I'm really happy with my purchase! The next size I think I will try is the baratone, only because i would love for my 70 year old mother to play along with me as well! This was worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Nope!

customer_reviews.title: Looks like solid wood top, sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewers who liked this Uke. So I will just say one thing a little subjective, not a deal breaker to me but the Gig bag could be at least an inch longer. That way it wont compress the neck into the body and throw the Ukelele out of tune. Looks like solid wood on top not plywood, resonates well. Better than expected, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: hi fi

customer_reviews.title: What a pretty little Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely little Uke. It looks pretty and feels durable. The items that come with it also seems to be of good quality. Particularly happy to recieve a tuner! For reference, it's a little bigger than a frying pan. Fits well in my hands though I can see why some people would have issues with the frets being very small, in that case I would recommend a larger instrument. Overall happy with my purchase! Also shipping was prompt and I received my product in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Aradhana Gahlaut

customer_reviews.title: ok but goes out of tune pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele is sturdy and the craftsmanship is good, but it does go out of tune very quickly. Sometimes that frustrates a kid and even the parents. I would suggest to look around before buying this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: SP21

customer_reviews.title: great ukulele for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another cheaper brand for my 8 yr old daughter and when it arrived I was surprised how toy like it was, so I then did a bit more research and purchased this - which is so much more like an instrument! Great sound and comes with an easy to use tuner which is a must as they need retuning regularly. I gave 4 rather than 5 stars because the case it comes with didn't last long at all - the zip broke.
customer_reviews.author: Cluckadoodledoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Ready to go right out of the box. Comes with its own soft case and extra strings! Tuner included with battery. The whole family has been learning from age 4-40!!! :) so much fun, especially when we are all indoors for the next month or two. Great company with lots of good communication.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality-Will not stay tuned at all
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice product at first glance but it is very poor quality. It will not stay tuned at all. Not even for 60 seconds. Do not buy this poorly made China product. Look for a US made ukulele. You can get a decent uke for around $125. Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Well made & good tone
customer_reviews.text: For a rank beginner like me, this is the perfect starter ukelele. The price is right, the size is manageable, the instrument is well constructed, and it has a nice tone (once you have mastered tuning it). It was great to have a tuner, strap and case included, so you really start out with everything you need. The rest is up to me!
customer_reviews.author: Pmlala

customer_reviews.title: Maybe we are missing the music gene.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe you need some inate musical ability that I lack. It just doesn’t seem to keep its tune and is far harder to learn than I thought. It is cute, very small and looks a bit like a kid toy. That being said we may just lack skill and attention. I am giving this to musical friends and will update with some solid knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: JBird1018

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the quality and overall feel of this soprano ukulele. Two things I especially like as a beginner are the discrete fret markings on the side and that a card stock chord chart was included. I am puzzled by an included piece of sand paper because the fret wires are completely smooth and don’t scratch at all.
customer_reviews.author: CatG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I literally just went upstairs to the main office in my school and picked this up. I unboxed it in my classroom 5 minutes ago. I'm a music teacher and have 2 class sets of ukuleles, but it's not enough for all of my students, so I bought one of my own so I would have one to demonstrate in class (and let's face it -- the uke is fun!). I love this particular instrument for 4 reasons. 1. It sounds amazing. 2. It's pretty. 3. Solid construction. 4. This package came with everything you need to start playing immediately. Highly reccommend. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Witter

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little started uke
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little started uke. It is solid wood and has great sound. It came with so many things that are included in the price. I teach lessons to little kids and this is a perfect one to teach with. It is not a toy. It is a real instrument. I recommend this one to my small students. You can't go wrong with it. You will not find a better deal on a real instrument with a tuner, extra strings, a strap AND a gig bag! WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet But Cant Cook

customer_reviews.title: Soprano Ukulele
customer_reviews.text: The ukulele is great and I liked the workmanship so much that I bought the tenor size from the same vendor and have been pleased with it too. The vendor threw in many extras that have all worked well with the exception of the tuner that broke fairly soon after it arrived. This happened with the tenor uke's tuner also.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old daughter. She has started playing the Uke in music class at school and asked for one at home. It came packaged very well. Craftsmanship seems good for what I know about Ukes. I like the bag better than the drawstring bag most other sellers offer. It tunes well with the tuner. She has already almost mastered Twinkle, Twinkle from the song book that was included. I am sure this will get used many times over in the coming weeks are we hunker down in homes during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn C.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for second option because first one was really crappy like a toy. Well...I love scent of instrument and easy to play. Instruction came with it is easy to follow. Also, tuned strings stay longer so I don't need to tune them again and again during playing. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: YOUNG JIN KIM

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: Got this little gem today, tuned it up and was very pleased with the sweet sound it makes! It's well made and attractive for such a reasonably priced instrument, and the tuner is marvelous and the gig bag is great for storage and travel. All in all, I'm very delighted with this ukulele bundle.
customer_reviews.author: cmdt

customer_reviews.title: My Sweet sounding First Ukulele packed with goodness
customer_reviews.text: This Ukulele is my first ever musical instrument, and I think its a great one for beginners, looks slick, plays well, the instruction manual and sample musical songs to learn is super helpful, i got the dark brown (specially offer) one and I have been practicing playing it since the time I got it last week. The bag/case and tuner as well as extra pair of strings combined with this serves as a wonderful package for a beginner like me. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Shashank H

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this one first!
customer_reviews.text: A couple years ago we bought our teenage daughter a generic beginner ukulele, but she struggled with trying to play it, so it just sat. Since we are all stuck at home now, she really wanted to use this time to try again to learn, so we bought her this better quality one based on the positive reviews. What a difference! She says this one is much more comfortable to play, and it has a better sound. She has been practicing and playing almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Muller

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: If you play guitar you should get this. The quality exceeds the price. The gig bag is very nice. The tuning is higher than a normal guitar, so if you sing in a higher key you don't have to use a capo. Just get it. You know you want it. You know you do. You slippery dog you.
customer_reviews.author: vic valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great ukulele!
customer_reviews.text: Great ukulele to learn on and came with everything you need and more. My 13 and 12 year old girls both loved it! They are teaching themselves to play and are doing a wonderful job with this ukulele! The strap and tuner were especially nice additions. The color was nice, the size perfect, and the case sturdy. The seller was very helpful and thorough. Highly recommended! The only think that wasn’t 5 star worthy was how long it took(well over a week) but considering it was shipped from clear across the country it was ok and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert martell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: 1) Arrived on time! 2) Packed very well! 3) Exactly as described seems worth more than what I payed, I went to a local music store and they didn’t offer any beginner packages and the starting cost there was $40 for the ukulele and $40 for a bag, however that bag was pretty nice but seen one on amazon that looked just as nice for a lower cost. 4) Looks great and actually sounded pretty good without being tuned up. Since it’s a gift for my 7 year old granddaughter I didn’t want to mess around with it to much! I will give an update a little later!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great ukulele that was easy to use and the craftsmanship was great. There were detailed instructions and a booklet for beginners that created easy steps to learn. The tuner was confusing to use at first but after understanding the device you could get a hang of the product. Overall the ukulele is a great instrument and was built for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: wewdc

customer_reviews.title: ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter and I'm anxious to see her reaction when I see her next week. I only gave 3 stars because I have to see her use it. She received the ukulele on a Wednesday evening and on Friday she played me her first tune. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hauck-canter

customer_reviews.title: What a quality instrument
customer_reviews.text: I cannot make an assessment if it is good for beginners because I am very much a beginner. That said, I am not sure how to evaluate sound quality. But I will say that everything was in perfect order, professionally packed, love the case, the strap, the tuner, and it is a beautiful instrument I am looking forward to becoming more proficient and then I can follow up this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ridge Views

customer_reviews.title: A very nice beginner Ukulele.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. I am very pleased with the quality of the ukulele for the price. It came with everything advertised and the extras were also good a good value. After several tunings it is staying in tune and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about this ukulele! Such great quality for the price. I have no idea what I’m doing but I’m stoked to learn. It comes with everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L

customer_reviews.title: Everything and More!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this product I had never owned a ukulele. This came with an instruction and guide booklet, as well as a sheet with all the key signatures on it. This was so helpful to me! The tuning attachment is so helpful and specific. I always tune it whenever I get my ukulele out because some strings fall slightly out of tune easily-- Which is common for ukuleles so the tuner is helpful. This product also comes with sandpaper? I'm not really sure what this is for but I'm sure it will come in handy in the future. This is a beautiful ukulele and it continues to bring me joy everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Hairr

customer_reviews.title: Great starter
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful package for a beginner. This ukulele looks fantastic. Sounds great for the money although the sound is a bit "tingy" when compared to higher end ukuleles. Tuner works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this ukulele
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ukulele. I’m a complete beginner and just started learning how to play . I think for the price you really can’t get a better deal than that. I love the tuner ... it’s so easy to tune the ukulele. I have to tune my instrument daily ... I think that’s quite normal for a new instrument. I really have no complaints. I recommend this ukulele.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ukulele for beginners. It’s a little smaller than most, but I didn’t have any trouble playing it any different. It comes with extra strings, a tuner, and a case so I didn’t have to buy anything extra at all. This is perfect for anyone looking to get started on the ukulele. It’s super cheap for a ukulele and definitely the best you can get for $50!
customer_reviews.author: ericbird

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use with everything I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this bundle. It has everything I need to get started playing the ukulele and it was easy to tune and play a song right away. I will definitely enjoy playing it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little uke
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking at various ukeleles for months and finally decided to buy this one. It is lovely, simple and feels very nice (not cheap or like a toy). The case is nice and the tuner makes it easy for a beginner to find the right tune. It does tune well and easily, but as I understand from reviews, some more expensive ukeleles might hold tune longer. It's a little touchy, but can play for a while with strumming and maintain. Customer service was very responsive to my question about strings. One was mis labeled. Comes with extra set for replacement. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CMP1017

customer_reviews.title: No need for super expensive purchases, this is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this ukulele on a whim almost exactly 2 years ago. Best purchase ever. I was a total beginner, honestly knew nothing going in. I practiced every single day- I got the hang of it in no time and love to play. I STILL use it, haven’t needed to replace the strings, no damage on it so it’s not bad material (and I am a very clumsy person, so it has hit some walls). Have zero need to replace it whatsoever. Has a really good sturdy feel and beautiful sound. If you wanna learn to play, this is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Richely Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Gift for kid
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this to learn on and decide if she liked playing. She loves it. Damn thing goes everywhere with us. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jking1142

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ukulele! It was very affordable and sounds amazing! I hate when ukuleles get out of tune in like 5 minutes, but this one really doesn't need to be tuned that often at all! I really enjoyed all the extras, especially the bag and tuner! (which both seem durable and work great!) Even the instruction booklet includes all of the chords you should learn and where to properly place each finger, it's overall very helpful. This was a very good purchase and I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MMJack

customer_reviews.title: Great Soprano Ukulele!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old saved her money to buy a ukulele. We wanted her to get a quality instrument without spending more than was necessary. We, and more importantly she, are quite pleased with our choice. The case is very good quality and should hold up well, and she looks so cute when she wears it like a backpack! The tuner works great. Most importantly, the instrument has a pleasing sound. I would highly recommend this instrument for any age beginner, and possibly a more advanced musician.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering this bundle. I’m new to playing and wanted a good first experience without busting the bank. I was super excited to get my shipment and even more excited when I opened the package. The uke is beautiful, the tuner works great, and the bag is sturdy. I’ve been playing it for a few weeks now. It has a nice warm tone and the strings are easy to strum. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great ukulele for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to learn it, didn't know how to play before. Though I have no comparison to other ukuleles, but for a beginner, this plays well and sounds nice. I play it everyday since i received it, $60 well spent, may be cheaper now.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: I figure it is already a great deal with all the extras included (gig bag
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect much at $40 price point. I figure it is already a great deal with all the extras included (gig bag, straps, tuner, picks, little song book). I was pleasantly surprised with Kmise. In fact, I love it way more than my old Kala. After allowing the strings to settle in and stay in tune, I find it very easy to strum. The action is softer and low. The sound bright and loud. It's the perfect sized ukulele to bring everywhere. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pokeys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ukulele is so much fun, price was right, quality is great! So far still breaking in the strings but it comes with so many accessories! I'm juuuuust about ready for my next concert ;)
customer_reviews.author: Adam frye

customer_reviews.title: 4 months later...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ukulele back in April and I LOVED it. Kept its tune really well and sounds beautiful. I had to replace my concert size and decided to go with the classic soprano size. Everything was fine until 4 months later when I noticed I had to constantly re-tune it, even after 10 minutes of just barely tuning it. I noticed where the neck and body connect it’s separating, almost like the glue used to hold the two pieces was coming off. I am really disappointed and sad that my ukulele didn’t even last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This Kmise soprano ukulele is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a ukulele after recently watching my son’s 6th grade class play them. I taught myself to play guitar many years ago, but could never get the cords with my short fingers. After seeing my son’s class I decided I could learn the uke pretty easily. This Kmise soprano ukulele is wonderful! It has good sound, tunes easily, and is fun to play. I love the tuner that comes with it, too. Way better than the old pipe tuner I had with my guitar. Add to that the included case, shoulder strap and a small beginners book, this is a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: mommygoround

customer_reviews.title: The instrument is well made, the instructions are easy to follow and there is a website
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful instrument and my grandson who turned 12 was thrilled to receive it. That’s all he talked about wanting and learning to play. He currently is taking the French horn he school but wants to play the ukulele. His older brothers were able to show him how to use the tuner and which strings are which notes. Hopefully by his 13th he’ll be a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Carman

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Wanted to start with something cheaper and am really surprised with the quality of it. The sound is amazing for the price. The tuner knobs stay tight and the Uke holds a good tune. It also came with a beginners guide and a good Little tuner. Overall satisfied though wish there was a choice of straps for it.
customer_reviews.author: PDub

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed with the sound quality compared to the reviews I read before purchasing. Otherwise it’s a nice looking Uke that essentially comes with all the works.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Bits

customer_reviews.title: For the price I understand
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality, little to no bass and just overall a shallow, cheap sound with VERY low volume. That being said, with all of the accessories, especially the very nice case, the level of quality is understandable for the price. In addition to this, when I was tuning the instrument for the first time the bass string snapped almost immediately. I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Mighty mighty ukulele, we love him so much
customer_reviews.text: I love my ukulele! I've been taking guitar lessons for years oh, but when I got this guy, I found a new love for music. Please learn how to play Amanda Palmer's ukulele anthem. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: kii1432

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for what I paid. It is what it is. A cheaper beginner Ukulele. The strings tuned quickly with the included tuner and the bag is cheaper, but it does what its made to do. The Ukulele looks great and sounds great when properly tuned. I did have issues getting it tuned, but with the humidity fluctuations in my area that is normal. I would buy another one if my wife or daughter became interested and I wasn't ready to upgrade yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to tune
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived on time with everything included as per described. The instrument is good looking and I am hoping to be able to get it tuned soon so I can start to play it. The strings do not seem to want to tighten around the tuning pegs in order to create a higher pitch. I am hoping that they will stretch with time. If not, I will be in touch.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Adler

customer_reviews.title: Great starting Uke!, beware the vibrations.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Ukulele, great starting piece especially for the price. Right out of the case easy to tune and sounded great despite shifting climates to and from Arizona for a wedding. Played it all weekend and I have having a blast. Only real draw back I have noticed is the sound can buzz amd bibrate if you are bot careful. Normally I would mark that up to player error but my fingers were not close enough to the frets to cuase the vibration. All in all fantastic starting uke for the price and definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Nora N

customer_reviews.title: The Strings Buzz
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this ukulele. I’ve had for a long time now and so far it’s been pretty good. It has low action and has a nice sound to it. One problem that I have had with this is that the a and e strings buzz. Sometimes it’s not bad but other times it’s unbearable. I have made sure that my ukulele is well tuned each time and it has been but the strings just keep on buzzing. I am not sure why the string buzzes it’s very annoying. Overall it hasn’t been a bad ukulele I just wish that the strings wouldn’t buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son is loving this! Came fast no damage and so pretty! Very easy for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Real great ukulele kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. My three children between ages 12 and 16 have picked up this instrument and started playing immediately. They only played keyboard before. Includes everything you need to begin. We’re enjoying this a lot. Small and sweet sound.
customer_reviews.author: chany

product_meta.title: Ukulele Soprano Beginner Mahogany 21 Inch Vintage Hawaiian Ukelele With Uke Starter Pack Kit ( Gig Bag Tuner Strap String Instruction Booklet )
product_meta.description:
Size:Soprano| Color:AcousticSpecification
Type : Soprano Ukulele
Size : Soprano Ukulele
Model : KMU21S
Tuner : Closed 18:1 pure copper gear
String : Advanced carbon nylon string
Nut & Saddle : OX bone
Fretwire : Cupronickel
Position Inlay : 5 7 10 12 frets ( same with side dot)
Body Material : Mahogany
Fretboard & Bridge : Walnut
Width at Nut : 1.38" ( 35 mm)
Width at 12th Fret : 1.77" ( 45 mm)
G String Action at 1st Fret : 0.019" ( 0.5 mm )
G String Action at 12tt Fret : 0.11"± 0.008" ( 2.8 ± 0.2 mm)
Package Include : 
1 x Soprano Beginner Ukulele
1 x Ukulele Starter Pack (Gig Bag ; Strap ; Tuner ; Extra Strings ; Start Guide )
feature_bullets: SEALED 18: 1 GEAR TUNING MACHINE: In the higher gears, the ukulele string can be tuned more precise, keep ukulele stay in tune better than 15:1 gear tuning pegs, ensures you would not be troubled by 'out of tune' so fast. Our gear made of pure copper will be harder, less rusting.

D'Addario CARBON NYLON STRINGS: Equipped advanced D'Addario strings, and luthiers pre-tune the ukulele at a lower action before we ship it to ensure you can touch the strings easier. Offer Life Time Free String Replace.

WELL FINISHED FRETBOARD: Come with Smooth fretboards on every side detail, you can roll over the frets and do not need to worry be scratched. The fret wires ends can be a very troubling point of contact with inexpensive instruments. These fret wires have been manicured.

FREE UKULELE ONLINE LESSONS: Kmise ukulele is the instrument of choice for schools - more people learn to play on it. Offer Free Online Lessons on our official website and How to Play Ukulele Quick Start Booklet.

A GREAT GIFT FOR MUSIC LOVER - Whether you’re looking for a birthday, Valentine's Day, Christmas or graduation gifts, send this ukulele to anyone that likes playing guitar or someone that just loves music. This could be an awesome gift for adults, kids who are just getting started with Ukulele.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,351 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Type: Body : Mahogany, Top : Mahogany, String : Advanced Carbon String, Fretboard & Bridge : Walnut, Nut & Saddle : OX bone
